#warning-banner {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 1000;
  overflow: hidden;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 13px;
  line-height: 16px;
  background-color: #7665a0;
  color: white;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center; }
  #warning-banner #dismiss-icon {
    margin-left: auto; }
  #warning-banner #warning-icon {
    padding-right: 10px; }
  #warning-banner a, #warning-banner a:visited {
    font-family: "Gotham 7r", sans-serif;
    color: white;
    text-decoration: underline; }
  #warning-banner a:hover {
    background: transparent; }
  #warning-banner #message {
    float: left;
    width: 90%; }
  #warning-banner #hide-warning {
    position: relative; }
  #warning-banner #hide-warning .close {
    float: right;
    font-size: 20px; }

.warning-sign {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #efcd1c; }
